values:
Nothing new going on.  Just bored.  It's raining and I wanted to do some yard work.  Guess I'll have to do house work instead.  BUMMER!  
Still trying to get everything loaded on new computer.  Don't have near the pictures of Colin that I used to, but at least now I can burn them for safe keeping!  LOL.
What a day!  Had a sick child all day(not mine)so plans were ruined for doing anything constructive.  There's always tomorrow!  NOT!

Just took my hub to his truck, so he's off to Houston.  Daughter is spending the night with a friend.  WooooHoooo!!!!!!!!!  Nice and quiet.  Did nothing today productive, except kill Mandy.  I am now Gwendolyn, thank Goodness.  Tomorrow I am going to watch Victoria and Albert while doing laundry and dusting, you know, the usual shit house cleaning.....

God I'm tired.  Raked up four bags of leaves in my miniscule backyard and of all things the back of my thighs are sore.  Thighs, not shoulders or arms, thighs.  New one to me.  Never ending laundry to do tomorrow.  House is a complete mess, still haven't put up stuff from week of being out of town.  Why do today what you can put off till tomorrow???  Oh well, it will get done sooner or later.

This is what I have found.  Thought it was interesting enough to share:


http://www.ka-bloom.org/forum/index.php?showtopic=9570

Click on 'if your an angry Firth fan'.
I am impressed with the huge lead in Hello poll for Colin!  Well done!  Keep it up, we don't want to relax just yet.  Kudos to all Firth fans!

but I've been voting and voting and voting!!!  Multiple browsers haven't worked for me, but multiple accounts have.  I was voting on eight different accounts but that is very time consuming!
Even if Colin doesn't win, he's still the most attractive man in my eyes!
